Mark of Castigation.name: Mark of Castigation
Mark of Castigation.fullText:
Hammer of Vengeance (PH2) Attack 11Mark of Castigation

You batter your foe with thunder and promise it explosive retribution if it attacks.

Encounter        Divine, Implement, Thunder
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Wisdom vs. Will

Hit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage. If the target hits or misses you or your ally before the end of your next turn, the target takes 3d10 + your Wisdom modifier thunder damage.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 117.
Mark of Castigation.flavor: You batter your foe with thunder and promise it explosive retribution if it attacks.
Mark of Castigation.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage. If the target hits or misses you or your ally before the end of your next turn, the target takes 3d10 + your Wisdom modifier thunder damage.

Thundering Summons.name: Thundering Summons
Thundering Summons.fullText:
Hammer of Vengeance (PH2) Utility 12Thundering Summons

With a thundering word, you call your allies to your side. They arrive like echoes rolling across the sky.

Encounter        Divine, Teleportation
Move Action      Close burst 10

Target: One or two allies in the burst

Effect: You teleport each target to a space adjacent to you.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 117.
Thundering Summons.flavor: With a thundering word, you call your allies to your side. They arrive like echoes rolling across the sky.
Thundering Summons.target: One or two allies in the burst
Thundering Summons.effect: You teleport each target to a space adjacent to you.

Warding Thunder.name: Warding Thunder
Warding Thunder.fullText:
Hammer of Vengeance (PH2) Attack 20Warding Thunder

You surround yourself and your allies with a ward of thunder, which batters your enemies. One of your allies carries your mark of protection, so if your foes attack that ally, the ward erupts in thunder again.

Daily        Divine, Implement, Thunder, Zone
Standard Action      Area burst 2 within 10 squares

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

Hit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.

Effect: The burst creates a zone of warding thunder that lasts until the end of your next turn. Choose an ally when the zone is created. If any enemy attacks that ally, you can make the following attack against each enemy within the zone as a free action:
    Attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude
    Hit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.

Sustain Minor: The zone persists.


Revision (10/13/2009)
On the Effect line, replace the last sentence with the following:

If any enemy attacks that ally, you can make the following attack against each enemy within the zone as a free action:
    Attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude
    Hit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.

Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 117.
Warding Thunder.flavor: You surround yourself and your allies with a ward of thunder, which batters your enemies. One of your allies carries your mark of protection, so if your foes attack that ally, the ward erupts in thunder again.
Warding Thunder.effect:
The burst creates a zone of warding thunder that lasts until the end of your next turn. Choose an ally when the zone is created. If any enemy attacks that ally, you can make the following attack against each enemy within the zone as a free action:
    Attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude
    Hit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage.
